title: Junior Business Analyst Roadmap
description: Career path for Business Analysts with 0-2 years of experience

nodes.label: Foundations
nodes.description: Core BA fundamentals you must master first

children.label: What is Business Analysis?
children.description: Understanding the BA role, responsibilities, and value proposition

resources.title: What Does a Business Analyst Do?

selfAssessment: Can you explain what a Business Analyst does to a non-technical person?
Can you list 5 key responsibilities of a BA?
Do you understand how BAs fit into Agile vs. Waterfall projects?

children.label: SDLC Fundamentals
children.description: Software Development Life Cycle models and BA's role in each phase

resources.title: Agile vs Waterfall: Which Methodology is Right for Your Project?

children.label: Requirements Fundamentals
children.description: What are requirements? Types, levels, and characteristics of good requirements

resources.title: What Are Requirements in Business Analysis?

children.label: Stakeholder Identification
children.description: Identifying stakeholders, creating stakeholder matrices, understanding influence and interest

nodes.label: Requirements Elicitation
nodes.description: Techniques for gathering requirements from stakeholders

children.label: Conducting Interviews
children.description: One-on-one and group interview techniques for requirements gathering

resources.title: Effective Interview Techniques for Business Analysts

practiceProject.title: Mock Stakeholder Interview
practiceProject.description: Conduct a 30-minute interview with a mock stakeholder to gather requirements for an e-commerce checkout feature

children.label: Facilitated Workshops
children.description: Planning and running requirements workshops with multiple stakeholders

children.label: Observation & Job Shadowing
children.description: Learning through observation of current processes and user behavior

children.label: Surveys & Questionnaires
children.description: Designing effective surveys for large stakeholder groups

children.label: Writing User Stories
children.description: Agile user story format, acceptance criteria, INVEST principles

resources.title: User Stories with Examples and Templates

practiceProject.title: E-Commerce User Stories
practiceProject.description: Write 10 user stories for an e-commerce product page with acceptance criteria
rubric: Stories follow 'As a [role], I want [feature], so that [benefit]' format
Acceptance criteria are clear and testable

children.label: Use Case Documentation
children.description: Traditional use case format for complex workflows

children.label: Process Flow Diagrams
children.description: Creating flowcharts, swimlane diagrams, BPMN basics

children.label: Requirements Documents (BRD/FRD)
children.description: Business Requirements Documents and Functional Requirements Documents

children.label: Jira for BAs
children.description: Creating stories, managing backlogs, using Jira workflows

children.label: Confluence Documentation
children.description: Creating pages, templates, team spaces

children.label: Excel for BAs
children.description: Pivot tables, VLOOKUP, data analysis for requirements

children.label: Lucidchart Diagramming
children.description: Flowcharts, wireframes, ERDs, mockups

children.label: Professional Communication
children.description: Email etiquette, meeting facilitation, presentations

children.label: Active Listening
children.description: Truly understanding stakeholder needs, asking clarifying questions

children.label: Critical Thinking
children.description: Analyzing problems, identifying root causes, proposing solutions

children.label: ECBA Certification
children.description: Entry Certificate in Business Analysis (IIBA)

children.label: Build BA Portfolio
children.description: Showcase requirements docs, diagrams, case studies

children.label: Professional Networking
children.description: LinkedIn optimization, IIBA chapter membership, meetups

milestones.title: BA Foundations Complete
milestones.description: You understand BA fundamentals and can explain the role confidently

milestones.title: Requirements Elicitation Competent
milestones.description: You can conduct interviews and workshops to gather requirements

milestones.title: Documentation Proficiency
milestones.description: You can create user stories, use cases, and process flows

milestones.title: Tool Mastery
milestones.description: You're proficient with Jira, Confluence, and diagramming tools

milestones.title: Junior BA Ready
milestones.description: You've completed the entire roadmap and are ready for mid-level BA roles

practiceProjects.title: Online Banking Feature Requirements
practiceProjects.description: Document requirements for a new 'Bill Pay' feature in online banking

practiceProjects.title: E-Commerce Checkout Redesign
practiceProjects.description: Gather requirements and document a complete checkout flow redesign
